moves.1. c4: Game began with my favorite move.
moves.1... Nf6 2. Nc3 e6 3. e4 d5 4. cxd5: Before this move, you saw Flohr variation of English Opening.
moves.4... exd5 5. exd5 Nxd5 6. Bb5+: After openings, my opponent has a small advantage (by position).
moves.11. a4 Nd7f6 12. Re1 Qb6 13. a5: My move has been wrong, because my opponent play with best move Nxc3.
moves.14... Nxd1 15. Bxd1 Bxb6: My pawn is dead now. My opponent has advantage.
moves.16. Ng5 Bd5 17. Bf3 Rad8 18. b4 h6 19. B: in the middle of the game (moves 15-32) no appear grandmaster moves or errors for both players.
moves.34... Ne6: My opponent try to kill my important pawn.
moves.35. d5 cxd5 36. Rxb5: My position on the table saying me that I will lost anyway.
moves.36... d4 37. Rd5: I try to stop this pawn.
moves.37... Rd1 38. Ne5 Nc7 39. Rd8 Na6 40. h4: Because the mission to stop his pawn become too hard for me I decided to put a trap.
moves.40... Nc5 41. h5 d3: My opponent can't see my trap and make this weak move.
moves.42... Ne4 43. Rh8#: Thank you to all of you who watching this 1st annotated game. Best wishes !
